title: ΕΙΒ supports Greece with record 5 bln euro financing in 2021 - Reuters
content: ΕΙΒ supports Greece with record 5 bln euro financing in 2021  Reuters
description: The European Union's lending arm, the European Investment Bank (EIB), provided a record financing of almost 5 billion euros ($5.70 billion) last year to help Greece shift to clean energy and support its businesses hit by the COVID-19 pandemic, officials said on Tuesday.
